titles: Scala c≈ìli Nineteen sermons concerning prayer. The first sixe guiding to the true doore: the residue teaching how so to knocke thereat that wee may enter. The former part containing a preparation to prayer, the latter an exposition vpon the seuerall petitions of the Lords prayer.
author: Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.
publisher: Printed by N. O[kes] for Francis Burton, dwelling in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Greene Dragon,
